title: Cosine Properties
text: Since the cosine is an even function, $$cos(-x)=cos(x)$$. Use this property to rewrite all angles as positive.

title: Rewriting cosines
text: What is the sum of cosines when both are rewritten to have a positive angle?

title: Equivalent Arguments
text: Since the two cosine functions have the same angle argument of $$7x$$, they can simply be added together with a multiplying coefficient of $$2$$.
